eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.name: NewAcoTokenData
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.name: SetAcoFeeDestination
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.name: SetAcoTokenImplementation
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.name: SetAssetSpecificData
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

functionDecorators.name: createAcoToken
functionDecorators.description: Function to create a new ACO token. It deploys a minimal proxy for the ACO token implementation address.

parameterDecorators.name: underlying
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the underlying asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: strikeAsset
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strike asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: isCall
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the ACO token is the Call type.

parameterDecorators.name: strikePrice
parameterDecorators.description: The strike price with the strike asset precision.

parameterDecorators.name: expiryTime
parameterDecorators.description: The UNIX time for the ACO token expiration.

parameterDecorators.name: maxExercisedAccounts
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum number of accounts that can be exercised by transaction.

functionDecorators.name: getAcoToken
functionDecorators.description: Function to get the ACO token by the parameters.

parameterDecorators.name: underlying
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the underlying asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: strikeAsset
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strike asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: isCall
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the ACO token is the Call type.

parameterDecorators.name: strikePrice
parameterDecorators.description: The strike price with the strike asset precision.

parameterDecorators.name: expiryTime
parameterDecorators.description: The UNIX time for the ACO token expiration.

returnDecorators.description: The ACO address or 0x0 if it does not exist.

functionDecorators.name: init
functionDecorators.description: Function to initialize the contract. It should be called through the `data` argument when creating the proxy. It must be called only once. The `assert` is to guarantee that behavior.

parameterDecorators.name: _factoryAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoTokenImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO token implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoFee
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the ACO fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoFeeDestination
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO fee destination.

functionDecorators.name: newAcoToken
functionDecorators.description: Function to create a new ACO token. It deploys a minimal proxy for the ACO token implementation address.

parameterDecorators.name: underlying
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the underlying asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: strikeAsset
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strike asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: isCall
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the ACO token is the Call type.

parameterDecorators.name: strikePrice
parameterDecorators.description: The strike price with the strike asset precision.

parameterDecorators.name: expiryTime
parameterDecorators.description: The UNIX time for the ACO token expiration.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoFee
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO fee. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoFee
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the new ACO fee. It is a percentage value (100000 is 100%).

functionDecorators.name: setAcoFeeDestination
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO destination address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoFeeDestination
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new ACO destination.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoTokenImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO token implementation address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoTokenImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new ACO token implementation.

functionDecorators.name: setAssetSpecificData
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the asset specific data.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the asset.

parameterDecorators.name: maxSignificantDigits
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum significant digits on the strike to create an ACO.

parameterDecorators.name: maxExercisedAccounts
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum number of accounts that can be exercised by transaction.

functionDecorators.name: setFactoryAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the factory admin address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newFactoryAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new factory admin.

functionDecorators.name: setOperator
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the operator permission.

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the operator.

parameterDecorators.name: newPermission
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the operator will be authorized.

functionDecorators.name: setStrikeAssetPermission
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the strike asset permission.

parameterDecorators.name: strikeAsset
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strike asset.

parameterDecorators.name: newPermission
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the strike asset will be authorized.
